text: Aca ashikirwa n’umwe muri babapfasoni babiri barajana nawe afise isoni, avuga ati:- Umuvyeyi wanje aragutumyeko kugira ngo aguhembe impembo yawe wakoreye yukutunyweshereza ibitungwa vyacu, rero mugihe yamushikira nuku mwiganira ivyabaye vyose, yavuze ati:- ntutinye uramaze kurokoka n’abantu bahemukiye imitima yabo
